original: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kenacid viññeyyam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na kenacid viññeyyaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kenacid viññeyyam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na kenacid viññeyyaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nakenaci viññeyyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kenaci viññeyyam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na kenaci viññeyyaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
